
name(The Introductory Stage)

snap(-5,-5,20)

sky(200,227,255)
fog(215,245,220) 
ground(195,210,210)

fadefrom(5000)

nlaps(4)

set(30,0,0,250,0)p
set(30,0,5600,250,180)p
set(46,0,9000,250,0)pr
set(30,0,12200,250,0)p
set(30,0,17800,250,0)p
set(30,0,23400,250,0)p
set(30,0,29000,250,0)
chk(60,0,28000,250,0)
set(34,0,33550,250,-90)pt
set(30,-4550,33550,250,90)p
set(34,-9100,33550,250,0)pt
set(30,-9100,29000,250,0)p
set(30,-9100,23400,250,0)p
set(30,-9100,17800,250,0)p
set(46,-9100,14400,250,180)pr
fix(61,-9100,10600,-1400,0)
set(30,-9100,11200,250,0)p
set(30,-9100,5600,250,0)p
set(30,-9100,0,250,0)p
set(34,-9100,-4550,250,90)pt
set(30,-4550,-4550,250,90)
chk(60,-4550,-4550,250,90)
set(34,0,-4550,250,180)pt

set(44,-4550,0,250,180)
set(36,-4550,2800,250,0)
set(35,-4550,8400,250,0)
set(35,-4550,14000,250,0)
set(35,-4550,19600,250,0)
set(35,-4550,25200,250,0)
set(44,-4550,28000,250,0)
set(53,-4550,10000,250,0)
set(53,-4550,14000,250,0)
set(53,-4550,18000,250,0)


maxr(10,4000,-6000)
maxb(4,-8400,-12800)
maxt(4,39600,-12800)
maxl(10,-15200,-6000)
